name: @pubnub/react-chat-components-monorepo
description: This monorepository uses npm v7 workspaces feature to crosslink dependencies between components library and sample applications.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd lib && npm run build:watch" "cd samples && npm run start"
scripts.samples:deploy: npm run samples:build && gh-pages -d samples/build -e samples
scripts.storybook:deploy: npm run storybook:build && gh-pages -d storybook-static -e docs
